page.title: 08 Interview With Mr.Grace
page.content: We held an interview with Mr.Bob Grace who has lived in Tring all his life and is a well known local historian. First we asked him,"What is the oldest building in Tring?"His answer was,"Well the church is regarded as the oldest building in Tring but there are several buildings with very old foundations." He also said, "At the car park in front of Bishop Wood school was once an old parsonage house and before that a manor house." Next we asked him "What do you think is the biggest change in Tring?" His answer was, "Well the biggest change in Tring is the great number of houses that have been built."
